answers.answer: Morning, am grateful to GOD for all that has happened in my life since February he turned everything around for me. Am grateful to be 32 weeks 1 day  pregnant, the longest I have ever been pregnant with a living moving baby that kicks and moves. Am grateful for the awesome husband I have who within the last three months has moved our stuff to storage, bought us a new town house and then in the middle of Minnesota weather moved things to the new house. Am thankful  for my body still hanging in, despite gestational diabetes and preeclamsia. And finally am grateful for the wonderful nurses and doctors who I have been in the hospital with for 2 months, and maybe another month. They truly are my heroes.

I am grateful for this miracle inside me and cant wait to meet her. Im so thankful for the man i have hes hard-working and supportive. Works over 150 hours a week so we can have nice things. Im thankful that God brought him to me when he did because my bf was headed down a bad path and i think God brought me into his life and this baby for a reason. Im thankful that im healthy and that my baby is healthy

Praised the Lord of my soul. . He is so good to us ... I feel a great spiritual energy  when I read all your comments  how beautiful  and unique God has work n  each live . Just perfect  !!!! Thank you my sweet  jesus  our king .

question: This year what are you grateful for  ? Tell us your lil history?   I'm grateful for  my baby on the way because he's doing great healthy  om excited i live  in a small house sweet  home  we have God in our hearts  first of all jesus don't leave us alone thanks God we have food everyday  love health and peace my husband works and loves me and is excited waiting to meet his first baby . Our first baby !!!!!! God is so good to us this year is being the best of all  . God has changed my life . I'm so happy because of all blessings.   How about you ladies?
title: what's your best thanksgiving wording  prayers?
